name: Youth Camp
description: Week-long summer camps offer kids a chance to discover the thrill of paddle boarding or kayaking in a fun, engaging, and safe environment. Skill levels available for paddle boarders: - Beginner - Intermediate - Advanced - Explorers - paddle boarders or kayak
